name: Search Filtering Feature
description: Implement advanced filtering for catalog search results.
business_context: Enterprise accounts require richer filtering to complete evaluation.

why_value.problem: Customers abandon search when they cannot filter results precisely.
why_value.desired_outcome: Deliver flexible filtering that keeps results relevant.
why_value.business_impact: Protect Q1 renewals and improve conversion.

in_scope: Expose filter UI for categories, price range, and stock
Add API support for compound filters
